forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a second dose of Hib is administered to a child at age 12 m- 5 days that the dose is valid. Forecast another dose.
reasonForChange:
V4.1: updated forecast dose number from 4 to 3.
V4.0: updated forecast to recommend a dose in 8 weeks - previously 4 weeks - since the patient will be over 12 months old at the time of the next dose and the spacing should be 8 weeks.
